subject: p13881772
Findings: The heart appears at least mildly enlarged. The mediastinal and hilar contours appear unchanged. There is a new mild interstitial abnormality suggesting congestive heart failure,and in addition, a small to moderate pleural effusion on the right and a small effusion on the left. Fissures appear thickened.
Impression: Findings consistent with mild pulmonary edema including pulmonary pleural effusions.
